Package com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.core

This package contains the public API of project streamflyer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Modifier
    A modifier replaces, deletes, inserts characters in a character stream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AfterModification
    This class is a message from the modifier to the stream processor, or technically spoken, this class represents the return value of Modifier.modify(StringBuilder, int, boolean).
    Documentation
    Read this first, before you use Streamflyer.
    ModifyingReader
    A Reader that allows a Modifier to modify the characters in the underlying stream.
    ModifyingWriter
    A Writer that allows a Modifier to modify the characters in the underlying stream.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FaultyModifierException
    Thrown if an implementation of a Modifier returns invalid messages to the ModifyingReader or ModifyingWriter.

Package com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.core Description

This package contains the public API of project streamflyer. You find more information in Documentation.
